name: HTML
detail: Any questions you may have will be answered within 10 hours during the course
Those who will finish the main course and SCIC (Super charged Interviewee club) will get access to work with the Job Placement Coach
70-80% of the students who finish our main course and SCIC on time, get an intern/job within 3-6 months of completion.
Our live conceptual sessions will clear your doubts through live coding in different projects.
Advance Crash Course (ACC)
You do not have a reliable internet! You can use our neptune app (android and ios) and windows desktop app to watch videos offline without.
work: Everyday we will be given a module/practice task. Videos will be released at 10.00pm. Smart students may trick our system to get module access 2 hours earlier than everyone else
A full module has approximately 10 videos (each video 12-14 min). You have to spend 4-5 hours watching, practicing the contents. We recommend allocating 6-8 hours everyday for this course.
Keep 1-2 hours everyday to clear our doubts from google, or using our support system. If you do not have any doubts, we recommend you search the similar topic of the module online
You will have a practice day after every 2-4 modules. And there will be a conceptual session on that practice day. We highly recommend our students to join the live conceptual session.
title: Learn HTML with iAcademy online course
